claw.tatsu.common

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • claw.tatsu.common.Utility

  • public final class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utilities methods that are useful in the whole project. Mostly to implements java 1.8 features that are not present in java 1.7.
    Author:
    clementval

        Join an array of String elements into a single String.
        Parameters:
        delimiter - Delimiter to be placed between each element.
        elements - Array of String elements.
        Returns:
        A joined string of all elements separated by the delimiter.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of element in the list.
        Parameters:
        delimiter - Delimiter to be placed between each element.
        elements - List of String elements.
        Returns:

      • convertToList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> convertToList(java.lang.Object rawObject)
        Convert an object back to a list of string
        Parameters:
        rawObject - Raw object to be converted.
        Returns:
        A list of string values. If the raw object is null or not an original list of string, the returned list will be empty.

      • hasIntersection

        public static <T> boolean hasIntersection(java.util.Set<T> set,
                                          java.util.Set<T> list)
        Check if there is an intersection between the set and the list.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the objects in set or list.
        Parameters:
        set - A given set.
        list - A given list.
        Returns:
        True if there is an intersection. False otherwise.

      • countOccurrences

        public static int countOccurrences(java.lang.String source,
                                   java.lang.String pattern)
        Count the number of occurrences of pattern in source string. Case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        source - String in which the pattern is search for.
        pattern - Pattern to be found.
        Returns:
        Number of occurrences.
